item.title: [DISTRELEC-4285] Facette building at PL level - wrong label - Ohm becomes Ohmhm
item.description:
CH - B2B
distrelec.ch
At article Level, unit is ok. See screenshot 01.
PL Level is
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/Widerst%C3%A4nde/Pr%C3%A4zisionswiderst%C3%A4nde/Metallschichtwiderst%C3%A4nde-0-1%25%2C-axiale-Anschl%C3%BCsse/c/cat-DC-58409
Label is wrong. See screenshot 02
item.summary: Facette building at PL level - wrong label - Ohm becomes Ohmhm

comments.comment:
Attached XML file to control that PIM Output is ok. That's the correct unit label that we have on the article page.
Problem occurs when facets are built.
Reason for this problem: During automatic SVN migration the special character Ω has been converted to O.
On Q for testing.
Tested. Ok.

attachment.name: ohm Unit at PL level - wrong label in Facette - screenshot 02.png
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4280] Additional Address field: Data cannot be saved.

  • click on save
  • Reload the site
  • Field is empty again
item.summary: Additional Address field: Data cannot be saved.

comments.comment:
francesco.colonna@distrelec.com
PW: 350000fco
Fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4278] Implement a parameter to switch the open order functionality ON and OFF
item.description:
The open order functionality must be switched off.
Please implmentent a logic to switch on and off the openorder functionality based on a system property.

The system property name must be:

distrelec.openorders.enabled=true/false

The default value is true

Please configure all the systems (Prod, Quality and Dev) with:

distrelec.openorders.enabled=false

Switch ON the functionality only for v2.1 release
item.summary: Implement a parameter to switch the open order functionality ON and OFF

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4273] Cart->Checkout // 500 error
item.description:
When adding product 7535504 to cart and trying to checkout, a 500-error appears. Please check what's the problem.

Time: 10.47 (Swiss time: 9:47)
env-hp-p03, v2.0.5 (Revision: 9085, 25.05.2014 00:08), 1746004

comments.comment: For me it works with node 1.
i'm not able to reproduce the issue.
I'll ask her if she can reproduce it anymore. But did you see something in the logs?

FYI: We were just able to reproduce it again. Please check the logs now..

Browser: IE 8
ID: 654955
PASWORD: welcome

It also happens with different items on this account! It's one of the biggest customers here.

The problem is related to the open order functionality.

Since this contact is part of a very big customer, the oper order functionality is active.

Unfortunally there is a bug in the platform when the open order are active.

I've implemented a logic to switch off the openorder when not needed.

Until the next deploy we've to find a way to disable the open orders in SAP (IF-08 ReadCustomer).
Update: It still don't works. All Customers which have the problem are assigned to pricelist 03(special price list). Please check if this is a possible source of the problem.
Was not deployed yet, please test when version 2.0.6 is on Q.
Gazwan will activate the functionality for customer 0001254415 on Q. Then I'm able to test.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4263] Access rights on uploaded files
item.description:
Hi Maciej
I talked to the Movex team (Raphael Leu) and they are sending us the files and change the permission as an additional step.

Please double check whether PI can send the following additional command after file transmission:

SITE CHMOD 664 erp_stock-20140525190142943.csv

Cheers,
Adi

comments.comment: I talked to Richard Skora and he mentioned the "after message processing" option (see screenshot)

Information from Maciej by Skype:

file was sent, but setting user rights were not successful:
Information Execute OS command "SITE CHMOD 664 /env-hp-q/inout/erp/source/sap/erp_product-20140526180309486.csv"
Warning Error executing OS command "SITE CHMOD 664 /env-hp-q/inout/erp/source/sap/erp_product-20140526180309486.csv"

After investigation:

  • OS command may be invoked on PI (as shown on screenshot), but it can either invoke command directly on PI system or run script on FTP server. In this case it must be script. This script must be written and present on FTP server. It must be parametrized with name of created file. There is no real error handling of it, so I don't know if that is the best solution, reliable one. I'm still waiting for the FTP access. And have no real experience here.
  • I tried to understand the need of write access to newly created files and this is what I suppose - you need it to check with write lock whether file is not currently being written, am I right? It seems to be quite a workaround. Isn't it easier to have Movex use temporary files? If they run system command anyway, they could rename file after creation as well.. just a thought.

Thank you Maciej for further investigation.

Status:
Raphael Husi is currently taking care about this issue. I (Adi) will be on holiday starting this afternoon.
As a next step he tries to change the default permissions on the FTP.
If this is not working, we have to change the way Movex is uploading the files (do a rename, too). But this also implies a change in our Application (to not check the write access anymore)
Önder Tasdemir will talk with HP to change the umsak for the FTP user SAP is using for uploading the files. In that case the files should automatically get the correct permissions.
Tested on Q. Works!
Testing in P needed, or can it be closed?
Works on P as well.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4227] MyAccount // Departement not shown
item.description: The Departement and Position is either not written to SAP or SAP is not taking those values and therefore under myaccount section this information is not displayed.

comments.comment:
We don't transfer department and position to SAP in the Elfa roll out.
But it should be written in to the HMC.
if the department is not set on the billing address, it will not be shown on the company informations

Background Info:
There was a discussion last week I believe with Adrian and Husi about how to handle department and position.

See https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3898?focusedCommentId=574604&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-574604

  • The fields should be stored in hybris only, not be sent to elfa over the IF
  • The info should be retrieved from hybris instead of SAP when loading user data

What is shown in the company information page is the billing address. However, the department and function are stored on the contact address.
The billing address is belonging to the B2BUnit (company), the contact address is belonging to the B2BCustomer.

As per Florian, we have to remove this information from the company page.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4219] When user changes email he is by default unsubscribed from segmentation
item.description: If a user decides to change his email address in the customer detail page, he is automatically selected as false for every segmentation as well as the industry that is lost.
item.summary: When user changes email he is by default unsubscribed from segmentation

comments.comment: Is this different in the CH web shop?

The problem happens when a user goes to his account and changes the email address where he normally receives the email.
Let's say that the user has all 5 segments to true and the industry to MRO.
AFTER changing the email address, his 5 segments appear in FALSE and industry as UNDEFINED.
could not reproduce
All working now

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3775] Page titles & Meta data text
item.description:
Here are some properties to translate:

Page titles:

  • product.page.title.buy=buy
    --> the product page page title should be in the format " {Product name}

    buy | Distrelec Switzerland"

  • page.title.online.shop=Online Shop
    --> the category page title should be in the format " {Category name}

    Online Shop | Distrelec Switzerland"

Meta Description:

  • meta.description.category=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0} kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the category description metadada

    * meta.description.homepage=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! Elektronik, Messtechnik, Computer kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the home page description metadata

    * meta.description.manufacturer=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0}

    kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the manufacturer description metadata

  • meta.description.product=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0}

    kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the product description metadata

comments.comment: some properties to translate
Salut Nabil, the translations for all rollouted countries and the new to be roll out LIT/NO/SV/DK?
these translations needs to be part of the next release, so we actually we need EN, DE, FR, IT and LT versions

Related tickets

  • DISTRELEC-3656
  • DISTRELEC-3780
Nabil, stp tu me rédis si le fichier est correct comme ça? Je comprends pas trop bien qu'est-ce que doit être traduit. Please check et rédis moi si c'est bon et on l'envoie en translation. Merci Stef
See comment and attachement. Thanks Stef
oui mais il manque les traductions , merci
Translations.
Translations in.
SE, NO & DK integrated in the base_*.properties
verified titles and meta tags for ch, looks fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1559] Product Detail Page - Tech Attributes: Show first 10 attributes instead of A attributes above "show more" button
item.description:
On the product detail page, in the section "technical attributes", currently by default the 'A' attributes are showing. If there are also 'B' and 'C' attributes for a given product, the 'show more' button appears.
In cases with only very few 'A' attributes, this looks a bit empty.

Therefore, the change request as per Florian is to always show at least the first 10 attributes above the 'show more' button.a

The logic is as follows:

  • If there are 1-9 'A' Attributes: show all 'A' attributes plus as many 'B' attributes (and if there are not enough of those, 'C' attributes below) as needed to display 10 attributes. The 'show more' button below will reveal all other attributes.
  • If there are 10 or more 'A' Attributes: showo all 'A' attributes, then the 'show more' button. The button will reveal all 'B' and 'C' attributes.

ToDos:
get estimate
update spec
approval
implementation
item.summary: Product Detail Page - Tech Attributes: Show first 10 attributes instead of A attributes above "show more" button

comments.comment:
Pascal,

can you please make an proper estimation for implementing the given change of the requirements.

Hi Lukas,

can you please take care of this CR. For more technical information how to implement this, please ask Pascal.

Thank you.
Out of Scope of Release 1 according to Oana
There is an additional potential Change Request related to the display of attributes on the detail page (DISTRELEC-2386). Please clarify final requirements before implementing.

Hi Lukas,

can you please take care of this CR. Thank you in advance. Dean.
Deferred to ELFA
Fixed. already on HP-Q
Verified, looks fine

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4287] IF-15_ReadAllOpenOrder has validation exception
item.description:
After making soap call to IF-15_ReadAllOpenOrder, We are getting validation exception on the response.

Please see the following stack-trace for more details.

02 Jun 2014 11:43:32 ERROR [hybrisHTTP3] [SapOrderService] WebServiceException while calling method 'if15ReadAllOpenOrders' on SAP PI interface: message = 'Unmarshalling Error: unexpected element (uri:"", lo
cal:"openOrders"). Expected elements are <{}total>,<{}shippingAddressId>,<{}currencyCode>,<{}orderEntries>,<{}paymentMethodCode>,<{}orderDate>,<{}orderNote>,<{}orderStatus>,<{}editableByAllContacts>,<{}custo
merReferenceHeaderLevel>,<{}subtotal2>,<{}vouchers>,<{}subtotal1>,<{}customerId>,<{}contactId>,<{}tax>,<{}shippingPrice>,<{}orderDiscounts>,<{}orderChannel>,<{}billingAddressId>,<{}orderCloseDate>,<{}shippin
gMethodCode>,<{}orderId>,<{}paymentPrice>,<{}costCenterId> ', cause = 'null'.
02 Jun 2014 11:45:07 ERROR [hybrisHTTP3] [error_page_log] a technical error occured [uuid: b8d2e9b9-2a90-4e4b-9cdf-35f836feec7a].

Could you please fix the WSDL align with the response.

comments.comment:
Here is the request to validate the same


<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <hyb:ReadAllOpenOrdersRequest>
        <salesOrganization>7710</salesOrganization>
	   <customerId>0001253910</customerId>
       </hyb:ReadAllOpenOrdersRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

Hi Maciej,

Could you please check this bug also from PI point of view? From stack trace it seems that it is expected another input.
I checked in SAP and the interface was processed successfully.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hi,

I just tested given request in SOAPui, the one which was attached to jira issue:

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
<soapenv:Header/>
<soapenv:Body>
<hyb:ReadAllOpenOrdersRequest>
<salesOrganization>7710</salesOrganization>
<customerId>0001253910</customerId>
</hyb:ReadAllOpenOrdersRequest>
</soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

And got the response from the webservice (http://daechs062u.dae.datwyler.biz:50000/XISOAPAdapter/MessageServlet?senderParty=&senderService=WSD&receiverParty=&receiverService=&interface=SI_Hybris_v1_out&interfaceNamespace=http://www.distrelec.com/hybris):

It looks correct.

But judging on errors seems like some value in xml is missing or is empty.
@Framcesco - could you please take a look?
Attched screenshot of validation error from soap ui
Maciej, Please test the case when no open order is selected. If you check in Q01 you will see that no open order should be returned. I think in this case is a problem.

Hello Ligia,
Could you please take a look. Variant OpenOrders. Two issues I see here. One is the error that Neeraj is mentioning (I think its PI issue as I dont see any problem in our side) and second is that with this call 3 orders should come back and I get nothing.

Environment is described as D, so I tested on D (deachs062). We need to be on the same page.
Neeraj, could you please specify where do you test?

Hi Maciej,

yes all the testing are done on D env.

Evangelos, In which system did you created the variant? I cannot find it.
In D system with the sales organization and customer specified are returned 3 open orders.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hi Ligia,

Yes me too getting 3 open orders in the response. The only problem which I had on my side and for that reason I open the jira ticket is the responses are not align with the wsdl file. So that means when you validate the response with wsdl it throws validation exception. (for more details, pleases refer the attached screen shot).

Somebody needs to adjust the wsdl file so that, these validation errors are gone away.
please check my attachement, it looks correct.
Fields requestedDeliveryDateHeaderLevel and completeDelivery seems that have been removed from the Schema in the Wiki. I think we should update from our side.
Those fields are not present in PI for very long time, at least through May. I don't know if they were present at all.

Hello Francesco,
Could you please let us know where is the missmatch between our response and on Webshop's expected one?

The definition of the structure ReadAllOpenOrdersResponse defined in the WSDL is incompatible with the response that we receive from PI.
In the WSDL definition is NOT defined to have the <openOrders> node, but in the response PI is creating this node.
As you can see from the screenshoots the wsdl and the response are incompatible.

In my opinion the response has the right structure, but somehow the WSDL is not containing the definition of the <openOrders> node.
Maciej could you please verify and fix the wsld definition?

About the two fields requestedDeliveryDateHeaderLevel and completeDelivery they have been removed.
So these fields are not needed.

Hello Maciej,
Could you please check Francesco's last comment for the WSDL and fix?

Sorry for late response, I was out of office yesterday. According to specification (https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-15+Order+Service#IF-15OrderService-%28!%29) there is no 'openOrders' element. So it looks like onle one order is returned?
There is a little mismatch in PI, as it looks like this element was removed on 9th May, maybe other objects were not aware of this change.

@Evangelos: please confirm whether specification in correct (no 'openOrders'). After that, I'll clean PI environment and ensure everything is ok there.

Hello Francesco, Maciej,
We are both working with wiki and hence we follow wiki.
Francesco, please check the setup from your side based on Maciej's comments and work together to solve this missmatch.
Thanks

Hi Maciej
the service can return multiple openorders.

Then the <openOrders> node is correct.
I think the WSDL should be fixed as well.
Could you please correct wiki, so we are on the same page.

@Maciej: the specification is not so clear, you're right.

From my point of view the <openOrders> node is fine to wrap each open order retrived by the service.

In this way we use a similar structure of the IF-15 SearchOrder.

Is it ok from your side to keep the <openOrders> node?

Wiki is fiexd: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-15+Order+Service#IF-15OrderService-%28%21%29

Please let me know if you need additional information.
It's ok, please let me introduce changes.
Changes done on D, import to Q requested.

Hi Maciej

I tested into d system , it looks fine now.

Thanks
On Q for testing.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4242] Initialising of zero stocks
item.description: Please start the initialization of the items with stock 0

comments.comment:
A conjob will be implemented with the following logic:

  • The job is searching for stocks that has not get an update since the last day 23:00
  • If the count of this stocks is bigger than a configured threshold (default 2000) than we skip the clean up and send a mail
  • There is a flag on the cronjob that disables the threshold check, so that we are able to delete more than the configured threshold
  • The job is running at 06.00 in the morning, so that we can ensure that the stock is fully imported.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3793] Hybris hmc -> DB character-limit Webtrekk-parameter
item.description:
For the Webtrekk-parameter 'WT Activate Event Tracking:' there is currently a DB limit of 255 characters (compare attached screenshot). This limit shall be increased to a limit of 1000 characters.

Thx Mark

comments.comment: Since Laurent has fixed DISTRELEC-4081. This is also fixed by that. When the merge will take place from brunch to trunk this will be also fixed on the trunk as well.
On Q for testing.

Issue still resides. Test-procedure:

  • http://q-hybris.datwyler.biz/
  • Account: mark.diggelmann
  • Website -> distrelec_LTContentCatalog
  • Webtrekk Properties
  • Field 'WT Activate Event Tracking'

Issue is remaining. Compare above and verify please.

Thx Mark
See Mark's comment.
With oracle we can not change the column type if we have data in the column. I have a solution but I will ask Raphael before.
Please clarify, thanks.

During the deployment and before the system update, we have to clean the CMS site table (wtActivateEventTracking attribute) with an impex (see release note 2.0.7).
After the system update, we will play impexes to fill again this attribute :

  • HP-Q : /environment/common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex
  • HP-P : /environment/env-hp-p-app-common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_XXContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex

Hello

We have found an easier solution. The column will be a varchar2 with a length of 2000.
Mark, is it enough for you? If yes, I can do it now on HP-Q.

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Laurent

Of course that's fine. I assume that varchar2 can handle any common characters/figures.

Thx Mark
Yes

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4279] Credit Card payment not working
item.description: Credit card payment doesn't work.

comments.comment:
There are different problems with the credit card payment:

I've found that we're transmitting to the payment provider the erpOrderCode, but this code, in case of ELFA, is not yet been generated.
I've fixed some of this bug in class AbstractDistPaymentParamStrategy (see revision 9117).
In this way the payment transaction is created using the right order code.

Another problem is that we always receive the fail status from the payment provider.
I've tryid to debug also connecting to the DBIS administration page, but i was not able to find the issue.
We should try to contact Renè, or the DBIS support.
Francesco, is there a follow-up ticket for "We should try to contact Renè, or the DBIS support", or is this also done now?

I placed a test-order on Q: 0073634819
Screenshot from SAP-Order is attached. There it says: "prepaid by card"!
Problem is: order is not visible in DIBS-Backend! Actually no order is visible in DIBS backend, also for Live!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4091] FE Issues My Account User Management (Newsletter)
item.description:
In the MyAccount section, there are the follwoing front end issues with the newsletter subscription part of the login data management (see screenshot):

  • yes/no radio buttons: they should be on the same line, yes on the left, no on the right, instead of one upon the other (as per styleguide) (orange part)
  • subscription questions (yellow part): they should only appear if the user selected "yes" in the above radio boxes
  • distance between last option and the "change" button (blue part) is too small, should be at least the same as the distance between two checkbox options.
item.summary: FE Issues My Account User Management (Newsletter)

comments.comment: If the greyed out stuff is not a frontend-bug, consider checking this issue: DISTRELEC-4264

Files checked in to SVN:

  • account-login-data-newsletter.jsp
  • account-login-data.skin.newsletter.js
  • account-login-data.less

Still not quite ok:
1) now the user never has a chance to change his settings
2) the implementation does not comply with the styleguide. The dropdown is not styled and the distances are too small.

Expected behavior is:
Regarding 1)

  • state 1: not subscribed
    • "no" is selected
    • user clicks on "yes"
    • the form below immediately appears, so that the user can select an industry and a category before clicking on change
    • if user clicks on "no" again at this point, the form should disappear
  • state 2: user is subscribed, has not confirmed yet
    • "yes" is selected
    • form below is visible but greyed out
    • if user clicks on "no" again at this point, the form should disappear
  • state 3: user is subscribed and has confirmed his subscription
    • "yes" is selected
    • form below is visible and editable
    • if user clicks on "no" again at this point, the form should disappear

Regarding 2)

  • see screenshot of the standard newsletter subscription form. The form styles, distances etc should be the same.
